title: Book Font (3)
content:
Hi once more,

Looking for ID on this font as  
well (circled in 'blue').

Your assistance is truly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114822im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Magazine_3_4431.jpg)

Font: 

 Alternate Gothic No. 1 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114822/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: tm6464

comments.content: It looks like a **[Alternate Gothic No 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114822/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=Alternate%20Gothic%20No1%20D%20-%20Regular&fid=173aa2c75698b66f4ebbd3b63f4b8030&fsize=60&text=racist&fit=1)** by Morris Fuller Benton [1903] with modified /i & /t
